name: Great Wyrm Red Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. climbing, 80 ft. flying
description: The Great Wyrm Red Dragon is a gargantuan dragon known for its fearsome presence and devastating fire abilities, characterized by its vibrant red scales and powerful physique.
memorable: It commands fear and respect, capable of unleashing massive fire-based attacks that can devastate entire areas.
goals: To dominate and intimidate those it encounters, often seeking hoards of treasure and power.
relations: Often serves as a primary antagonist, commanding armies of lesser dragons or creatures.
environment: Lurks in volcanic regions, fierce mountain ranges, or ancient dragon lairs.
strengths: Possesses powerful multiattacks and access to potent fire spells, alongside legendary resistances.
weaknesses: Exhaustion of legendary resistances temporarily lowers its defense; specific vulnerabilities can be exploited.
attacks: Devastating melee attacks including a bite, claws, and tail; can unleash powerful fire breath cones.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath attack inflicts massive area damage and ongoing fire effects, causing fear.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 24, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in Intimidation and Perception, enhancing its menace and situational awareness during encounters.
additional_information: Can recharge its breath weapon when bloodied, enhancing its already deadly arsenal.
Immunity to fire damage aligns with its elemental nature, dominating fiery environments.
Utilizes legendary actions to maintain battlefield control and assert dominance.
Can inflict fire damage on touch or melee attacks, punishing foes relentlessly.
Commands and influences allies with its Cruel Tyranny ability, allowing it to direct actions in combat.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability with spells such as command, hold person, and fire-related spells available multiple times daily.
